title: amable
author: amable
content: Hi, 11 days ago I've made a request to withdraw my funds from Bibox exchange and until now they continue to delay me and not solve my problem. Please be aware that Bibox exchange is scamming people! I'm very dissapointed by what happened. Shame on them!Is there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. Ty

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Can you explain more about your case? there's must be a reason why Bibox not allow you to withdraw, you can share the reason if you don't mind. Have you contact them via email or other social medias? sometime support service can help you.I have never use Bibox exchange, but according to Coingecko and Coinmarketcap, this exchange doesn't have a good reputation, just a small exchange where you can only trust for small amount money.

comments.author: amable
comments.body: There is no reason...I've talked since the first day with their support team[zendesk], but they only promised that will solve my problem...and have done nothing since then. I have commented on their Twitter account and I've been blocked.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:28:55 PMIs there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. TyUnfortunately, you were not careful and did not check in detail the reputation of the Bibox exchange, so you became a victim of the umpteenth scam from the Bibox exchange.We are very anti to using the Bibox exchange, because Bibox has carried out its actions from 2019 until now.Experiences of users fooled by Bibox exchange.Quote from: ChiNgadOr on January 06, 2018, 01:13:49 AMi sent  2 hours ago some ETH. checking TX HASH it appears as confirmed! "SUCCESS" .. so shouldn't it appear automatically  balance in my ETH acocunt int BIBOX?i think i have been scammed. so be carefull guysAnd this is another series of accusations, caused by the Bibox exchange, against its users.* EXCHANGE SCAM ? TX HASH confirmed, but balance still as 0!* Bibox Technology Ltd. "Bibox" crypto-exchange is trying to scam my profit.Conclusion: the OP for the future did a rise first before using a crypto exchange that is outside or operating here, regarding their reputation, to prevent losses.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Seeing these tags in coingecko and coinmarketcap, you're not the only one op. In addition, there's also a swarm of withdrawal complaints since last year on their twitter- most of the comments are about it. Quote from: https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/biboxWe have received some reports from users being unable to withdraw funds from Bibox. Please exercise caution and DYOR while trading. Quote from: https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/bibox/We have received reports from multiple users being unable to withdraw funds from this exchange. Please exercise caution while trading and always DYOR.That being said, the whole situation doesn't seem like a day-to-day problem we see all the time, there's a good chance it's deliberately done... Can you share your chats with the support? you can upload it in any image hosting websites.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:28:55 PMHi, 11 days ago I've made a request to withdraw my funds from Bibox exchange and until now they continue to delay me and not solve my problem. Please be aware that Bibox exchange is scamming people! I'm very dissapointed by what happened. Shame on them!Is there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. TyFirstly, you have not explained your problem in detail, which makes it difficult to understand why you are facing this problem. We cannot mark an exchange as a scam exchange without knowing the details. I have never used this exchange so I am not aware of their reputation. So you can add the screenshots of what kind of conversation their support team had with you in this thread, so that everything will be easy to understand the current situation.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:28:55 PMHi, 11 days ago I've made a request to withdraw my funds from Bibox exchange and until now they continue to delay me and not solve my problem. Please be aware that Bibox exchange is scamming people! I'm very dissapointed by what happened. Shame on them!Is there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. Ty I have not heard of this exchange platform name. It is new to me. And not all the exchange platforms you see in the internet that are legit. There are some that are there to scam people funds, and some are paying out but their charges rate is very high that many people can't use them. That is why when you want to use any of them make sure you ask questions to know them more.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.created_time: March 28, 2023, 06:36:58 PMLast edit: March 28, 2023, 09:10:11 PM by acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:45:38 PMThere is no reason...I've talked since the first day with their support team[zendesk], but they only promised that will solve my problem...and have done nothing since then. I have commented on their Twitter account and I've been blocked. the fact that they are trying to hide the issue you have with them on their social media account by blocking you is concerning(unless of course, if you are spamming them).anyway, it would be good if you can provide screenshots of emails or a chat of your conversation with them that supports your claim. it wouldn't really help you but it could help people decide whether to use the exchange site or not.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: OP, this is a big lesson to learn. When you are going to trust a service with your money, make sure you do intense background checks. I am sure you would have missed seeing more than a dozen complaints about Bibox from the past.Quote from: Agbe on March 28, 2023, 06:25:02 PM I have not heard of this exchange platform name. It is new to me. And not all the exchange platforms you see in the internet that are legit. For me, I only started hearing about it when there were several reports from users getting scammed by the exchange

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: 11 days is a long period of time for your withdrawal request to proceed. I am sure that they've got a system that sees those withdrawals that are on queue and if yours have been there for nearly 2 weeks, they'll take notice of it.But since they're not taking action on it, you've probably haven't seen the reputation that they've got and doing some quick search on the web will show you that they've got 3 stars and even 1 stars for most of the ratings websites that they're part of.And if a website rates them on 5 stars that's most likely was too old review and likely it was just during their launching. It's always good to check ratings, good and bad to give you the thought on what type of exchange they are. I'm still wishing you that you'll be able to reach out to them and just grant your withdrawal request and if it happens, never deposit again there and leave them.

comments.author: macson
comments.created_time: March 29, 2023, 02:17:02 PMLast edit: March 29, 2023, 02:31:15 PM by macson
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:28:55 PMHi, 11 days ago I've made a request to withdraw my funds from Bibox exchange and until now they continue to delay me and not solve my problem. Please be aware that Bibox exchange is scamming people! I'm very dissapointed by what happened. Shame on them!Is there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. Tyhi OP, have you used this bibox exchange often, i saw their review on trustpilot and many complain about their withdrawals that bibox has never processed,[1] https://www.trustpilot.com/review/bibox.comif someone offers you help, you have to refuse it, you have to fight for it yourself, keep sending an email to their support, don't let others fool you.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on March 28, 2023, 04:38:53 PMSeeing these tags in coingecko and coinmarketcap, you're not the only one op. In addition, there's also a swarm of withdrawal complaints since last year on their twitter- most of the comments are about it. Quote from: https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/biboxWe have received some reports from users being unable to withdraw funds from Bibox. Please exercise caution and DYOR while trading. Quote from: https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/bibox/We have received reports from multiple users being unable to withdraw funds from this exchange. Please exercise caution while trading and always DYOR.That being said, the whole situation doesn't seem like a day-to-day problem we see all the time, there's a good chance it's deliberately done... Can you share your chats with the support? you can upload it in any image hosting websites.Even the Gecko and CMC are already prompting a warning to this exchange. I have not used them, but whenever something like a warning from coin rank listings, you have to believe something is wrong with that exchange.OP may not already have to post pieces of evidence, after all, he is just warning users. Crazy to still see someone drifted to an exchange that isn't very known. It couldn't be possible that Bibox will be the top result of a google search.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: macson on March 29, 2023, 02:17:02 PMhi OP, have you used this bibox exchange often, i saw their review on trustpilot and many complain about their withdrawals that bibox has never processed,Trustpilot rating is not trusted because it was plagued by fake review and user that has an isolated case on exchange that often gives negative feedback. Even Kucoin has a 1.5 Star rating in there despite Kucoin is much popular than Bibox with a little bit high review.Bibox exchange is same country with Kucoin that based on Singapore. They are not that huge but they have a decent volume on their exchange. I use them for quite some time for buying exotic tokens that is not listed yet on huge exchange. OP doesn’t have any proof so I will not judge the exchange quickly.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on March 29, 2023, 02:44:34 PMTrustpilot rating is not trusted because it was plagued by fake review and user that has an isolated case on exchange that often gives negative feedback. Even Kucoin has a 1.5 Star rating in there despite Kucoin is much popular than Bibox with a little bit high review.Bibox exchange is same country with Kucoin that based on Singapore. They are not that huge but they have a decent volume on their exchange. I use them for quite some time for buying exotic tokens that is not listed yet on huge exchange. OP doesn’t have any proof so I will not judge the exchange quickly.Well, let's not rely on Trustpilot reviews about Bibox, what about negative user reviews on Bibox in Google Play and the 1-star ratings of thousands of users which indicates that this exchange is already notorious, you can take a look for yourself: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.box.pro&hl=en&gl=USWhat I saw is that there are many users who have not been able to withdraw from the Bibox platform yet, and OP is not the only victim here, in addition to that there are those who claim that after they downloaded the Bibox application on their phones, it was classified by AntiVirus programs as a virus.Although the OP did not provide conclusive proof, what I saw from google search engine proof made me endorse the OP's position that it is a scam exchange platform.

comments.author: amable
comments.body: Hi everyone and thanks for all your support and advice! I want to upload my conversation with their 'support' team, in order to understand better what is happening to me.As you can see, they delay me day by day and not solve my problem...https://i.ibb.co/JtzY04S/1.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/8Ntw0DJ/2.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/VxQsWW9/3.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/2SxPrbG/4.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/tbHVNQN/5.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/jL1x3PN/6.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/0DS4gDG/7.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/wzNdYRT/8.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/f2VF7s2/9.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/L810qpG/10.jpg

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: amable on April 02, 2023, 04:31:56 AMHi everyone and thanks for all your support and advice! I want to upload my conversation with their 'support' team, in order to understand better what is happening to me.As you can see, they delay me day by day and not solve my problem...Quoting for visibility.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Quote from: amable on March 28, 2023, 02:28:55 PMHi, 11 days ago I've made a request to withdraw my funds from Bibox exchange and until now they continue to delay me and not solve my problem. Please be aware that Bibox exchange is scamming people! I'm very dissapointed by what happened. Shame on them!Is there anyone who had the same problem like me? Will help to know. Tyi used bibox almost two years ago because there was an Airdrop for new users and that time everything was ok and i didn't experience any trading, deposit or withdraw problem. Lot if time passed now and many third class exchanges are delaying their payment. i did not seen any post in twitter about bibox exchange. You should reached to customer service and ask that what is real issue. maybe the token you withdraw has been temporarily suspended by exchange.

comments.author: amable
comments.body: Still they continue to bla-bla and not giving my money back...16 days since they frauded me.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: I checked all their social media and all the support just coldly ignored the complaints. I'm not sure that there is even a shred of hope left for users to get their money back. Two aggregator sites have also drawn the conclusion that one should be careful with this exchange.

comments.author: amable
comments.body: Still I'm ignored and those thieves don't give my money back!
